professional_summary: Over 4 years of experience as an Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in professional Oracle database administration support and solutions for Windows and Linux systems. A collaborative team player able to manage multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment, seeking to learn emerging technologies while exceeding expectations and company objectives.

key_responsibilities: Installation and administration of Oracle 10g/11g &12c databases.
System upgrades including hardware
operating system
and periodic patch upgrades.
Performance tuning using AWR
ASH
ADDM
Explain Plan
Vmstat to gather statistics.
Performing security scan remediation on database servers to reduce risks.
Providing best practice measures for applicable applications and database hardware and software troubleshooting.
Preparing documents and attending meetings to discuss remediation and exemption lists with other teams.
Setting up over 208 user/group login accounts and passwords.
Performing patching and upgrading to the most recent patches and versions for all releases
developing backup and recovery strategies for Oracle databases.
Assisting users with login issues
resolving them
and tuning up databases.
Performing data migration for Oracle 10g/11g &12c pluggable databases using Data pump/EXPDP/IMPDP.
Hand-on experience in cloning the non-multitenant container database to pluggable database in 12c using PDB Metadata clone.
Carrying out database clone and database refreshing.
Establishing key root cause analysis findings and facilitating recommendations on problem avoidance.
Performing Oracle Database installations
upgrades
and troubleshooting as needed.
Monitoring DR & Standby Database and providing critical solutions for database security.
Performing Backup and Recovery using RMAN and OEM for logical and physical backup and Hot/Cold backup.
Supporting end users and providing basic training to new users as required.
